content:
Sure! Here are some upcoming movies that have the potential to break Avatar's record:

1. Avatar 2 (directed by James Cameron)
2. Star Wars: Episode IX (directed by JJ Abrams)
3. Avengers: Endgame 2 (directed by Anthony and Joe Russo)
4. Jurassic World: Dominion (directed by Colin Trevorrow)
5. The Batman (directed by Matt Reeves)

These are just a few examples of highly anticipated movies that have the potential to break records, but whether they will be able to surpass Avatar's record or not remains to be seen.
